body.name: Burt's Bees Sensitive Solutions Gentle Cream Cleanser with Aloe, 98.9% Natural Origin, 6 Fluid Ounces
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 4 mins
features: GENTLE FACE CLEANSER: Simplify your skin care with Burt's Bees Gentle Cream Cleanser that moisturizes while gently removing dirt, oil and makeup; package may vary
IMPROVE SKIN’S MOISTURE BARRIER: Helps improve your skin’s moisture barrier, when used daily as directed, by removing dirt, oil and makeup without stripping the skin of crucial moisture
FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: This cream cleanser contains Aloe that helps soothe skin, and it has received the National Eczema Association Seal of Acceptance
98.9% NATURAL ORIGIN: This 98.9% natural origin cream cleanser includes nutrient-rich botanicals and is formulated without parabens, phthalates, petrolatum or SLS
LEAPING BUNNY CERTIFIED: This Burt’s Bees cream cleanser for sensitive skin is Leaping Bunny Certified, which means the product is never tested on animals
body.description: Improve your skins moisture barrier over time when you cleanse with this cream cleanser, which gently removes dirt, oil and makeup without stripping the skin of crucial moisture. Sensitive skin has a depleted moisture barrier, which may allow irritants to trigger redness. This 98.9% natural origin face cleanser formula has received the National Eczema Association Seal of Acceptance and is formulated without parabens, phthalates, petrolatum or SLS, and it is never tested on animals. Its easy to add this gentle facial cleanser to your daily skin care routine. Wet face and apply cleanser with fingertips or wet washcloth. Massage gently, avoiding contact with the eye area. Rinse thoroughly and pat skin dry. For best results, follow with Sensitive Calming Day Lotion in the morning and Sensitive Calming Night Cream at night. See how Burts Bees turns ingredients from nature into gentle and effective nourishment for even the most sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing, Paraben & Phthalate-Free & Soothes Mature Skin
reviews.reviewText: This is a white cream cleanser that comes in a tube. It is mainly natural ingredients, leaping bunny certified (meaning it is cruelty-free) & responsible resourcing-it states all that on the back of the tube. My skin has always been sensitive and reactive and especially in winter with dry indoor heating and cold outdoor winds. I need a cleanser that is fragrance-free and isn't foaming so it doesn't strip my skin of moisture or make it rough and red. This cleanser contains aloe which adds some moisturizing properties. I dampen my face first apply a small of amount of cleanser to clean my face working it in circular motions with my fingertips. The cleanser is rather thick but I have found removing it with a damp washcloth works well. I allow my face to dry then apply treatment or moisturizer (always use sunscreen during the day). For someone that had former skin issues my skin looks better and gets noticed. It is an economical way to keep my face clean andthere are no parabens or phthalates in this cleanser either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: With aging skin, this is gentle but still cleans your face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great so far
reviews.reviewText: It takes me a very long time to decide on products especially skin care. It takes day, research, reviews, comparison and youtube videos. I have tried cerave, ponds, Cetaphil ponds vani cream and others. I have sensitive skin so my options are limited. So far of vanicream was the best but in the winter it left my skin red and itchy. I have oily skin in the summer and I'm learning that I have combination skin in the winter so the other products didn't work for me anymore. They were too thin and watery. My skin never felt clean. I've only used this for a few days but so far by feel alone I love it. The downside is that it smells like glue but the scent is not strong or offensive. Its to be expected with a semi natural product. But it is nice and smooth not too thick or too thin like the vanicream and cetaphil. It took off makeup a lot better than the others as well. Did not have to double cleanse. I also like the moisturizing effect. My skin feels clea and not heavy. It takes time to see how my skin adjusts to new products so I will give it some time before I make a follow-up review but so far I give it 4 stars. Great price as well especially because u really only need a pea sized amount. I normally ignore products that say that but its very true with this one. It will last me a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans your face
reviews.reviewText: Cleans your face and leaves it soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had the facial cleanser for sensitive skin once and it works great. I recently ran out so I got a new one. My skin is very sensitive to certain products like CeraVe. My skin usually starts to burn. But when I tried this one, it left my skin clean, soft, and gave me no irritation. I would also recommend this product if you have dry skin because it’s very hydrating. I also feel like the ones that have a sent are bad for your skin and this one doesn’t so I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly a holy grail product for me
reviews.reviewText: It’s been using this for probably 5-6 years now and I swear by it. It doesn’t work well to take makeup off so I like to use this in the morning and something that lathers at night. For night I like to use Burt’s bees liquid acne face wash, Clinique, or purity made simple. I’m 30 and I’ve struggled with acne since my teens but following this routine + a weekly mask and daily toner, and of course a good moisturizer, my skins never looked better. I realized using acne face wash everyday was just making matters worse.This is super moisturizing, very gentle, and exactly what I needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, for me inexpensive Turkish oil soap (4 bars for $3.50 ) is just as effective. I don’t think it helps sensitive skin and actually feels a bit greasy. Having said that it’s probably effective for someone with very dry skin. I will use up what I purchased but not order again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best makeup remover
reviews.reviewText: This is now my favorite makeup remover. Initially, I bought it for facial cleaning but it wasn't really my favorite. However, when I ran out of my previous makeup remover and tried this one, I was pleasantly surprised by how well it works. Unlike regular makeup remover wipes, this product doesn't leave my face red.

I've been using this stuff for many years ,my skin loves it ,it's quite sensitive to most cleansers out there,a little amount goes a long way,leaves it feeling cleaned out ,soft not tight,moisturized not oily.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente para pieles sensibles, deja una piel más fresca y tersa
reviews.reviewText: En general mi piel del rostro se irrita fácilmente, he usado varios limpiadores faciales y casi todos me han irritado. Probé los de Aloe Vera de The BodyShop y si bien no me irritaban, sí me secaban el rostro. La crema limpiadora de Burts Bees es bastante suave y no sólo no me ha secado la piel del rostro, también la noto más suave o tersa, más jugosa sin llegar a ser grasa (y eso que mi piel es grasa). El cambio lo noté como al mes de usarlo. Tiene una consistencia de crema, no hace espuma, por lo que al principio cuesta acostumbrarse, pero nada del otro mundo. Pienso usarla con un cepillito facial para limpiar un poco más mi rostro, aunque solo será para probar.

I am insanely picky when it comes to these types of items and this one checked all the boxes for me.Its slightly too oily and it benefits from using it with a washcloth but other than that its amazing.

Inizialmente mi è sembrata una crema troppo corposa per essere un detergente: mentre la massaggio sento il viso untissimo e penso che mi rimarrà tale. In realtà si risciacqua benissimo e la pelle rimane morbida e liscia: davvero una bella sensazione. Come detergente quotidiano lo trovo buono, ma come struccante non mi ha entusiasmata. Considerando che solitamente non uso un trucco eccessivamente pesante, devo dire che ne rimuove ben poco. Io lavo via il grosso con questo prodotto ma devo sempre e comunque terminare con l’acqua micellare. Peccato….
Très satisfaite de l'effet qu'a eu ce produit sur ma peau. Cela me laissait toujours avec une peau propre et la crème est très douce.
